mapper.select: select userId, userName, nickName, userTel, userEmail, regDate, updateDate from tbl_member
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member(userId, userPass, userName, nickName, gender, userTel, userEmail, regDate) values(#{userId}, #{userPass}, #{userName}, #{nickName}, #{gender}, #{userTel}, #{userEmail},now())
mapper.update: update tbl_member set userPass=#{userPass}, userName=#{userName}, nickName=#{nickName}, userTel=#{userTel}, userEmail=#{userEmail}, updateDate=now() where userId=#{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_member where userId = #{userId} and userPass = #{userPass}
